Package: uniandes.unacloud.web.services

[Groovy] Class UserGroupService

    • uniandes.unacloud.web.services.UserGroupService

    • This service contains all methods to manage User group and users in groups: UserGroup crud methods, and methods to add and remove user from groups. This class connects with database using hibernate

      Authors:
      CesarF

        • java.lang.Object addGroup(java.lang.Object name, java.lang.Object users)

          Saves a new group with the given users

          users - list of users that will belong to the group

        • java.lang.Object addToGroup(UserGroup group, User user)

          Adds a user to a group

          Parameters:
          group - to add user
          user

        • java.lang.Object deleteGroup(UserGroup group)

          Deletes the given group

          Parameters:
          group - to be deleted

        • UserGroup getAdminGroup()

          Method to return admin default group if group doesn't exist, create and return it

          Returns:
          admin default group

        • UserGroup getDefaultGroup()

          Method to return users default group if group doesn't exist, create and return it

          Returns:
          user default group

        • boolean isAdmin(User user)

          Method to valid if a user is part of administrators group

          Parameters:
          user: - to be validate
          Returns:
          true is admin, false is not

        • boolean isAdmin(long userId)

          Method to valid if a userId belongs to a user that is part of administrators group

          Parameters:
          userId
          Returns:
          true if user id is from a admin user, false in case not

        • java.lang.Object removeUser(User user)

          Removes user from all groups where it is added

          Parameters:
          user - to be removed

        • java.lang.Object setRestriction(UserGroup group, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)

          Sets a new group restriction to the given group

          Parameters:
          group - with the new restriction
          name - restriction name
          value - restriction value

        • java.lang.Object setValues(UserGroup group, java.lang.Object users, java.lang.String name)

          Edits the given group with new values

          Parameters:
          group - group to be edited
          users - new list of users
          name - new name
